import React,{useState}from"react";import HomePage from"./Components/homepage";import Login from"./Components/login";import Signup from"./Components/signup";import Dashboard from"./Components/Dashboard";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);// Track login status
const[isSigningUp,setIsSigningUp]=useState(false);// Track signup form visibility
const[viewHome,setViewHome]=useState(true);// Control HomePage visibility
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:viewHome?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{setIsSigningUp:setIsSigningUp,setViewHome:setViewHome}):isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{}):isSigningUp?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signup,{onSignup:()=>setIsLoggedIn(true),onToggle:()=>setIsSigningUp(false)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:()=>setIsLoggedIn(true),onToggle:()=>setIsSigningUp(true)})});}export default App;
